entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
